name: Saraswathie Lodge (Bambalapitiya)
description: Saraswathie Lodge is another pure-veg South Indian spot on Galle Rd in Bambalapitiya. The ambience isn't as charming as nearby Greenlands Hotel but the thosai is marginally better.
tip: Brush up on your Tamil if you want the waiter to sneak you an anecdote or a kitchen secret or two.
review:
